content: I'll definitely keep those tips in mind when creating my Winter Vibes playlist. I've been trying to get back into creating my own playlists, and it's been really fun to curate songs that fit a specific mood or theme. I've also been listening to a lot of podcasts lately, especially "All Songs Considered" by NPR, which has been a great way to stay up-to-date on new music releases. Have you got any recommendations for other music-related podcasts?
